Uses of Class
command.CommandController

Packages that use CommandController 
Package Description
command.commandController  
command.commandView  
command.game.eventController  
command.game.eventOutput  

  • Uses of CommandController in command.commandController

    Subclasses of CommandController in command.commandController 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  DropController
    Drops the specified item in the current room of the active player.
    class  GiveController
    Gives the specified NPC object the specified item.
    class  GoController
    Updates CurrentRoomJSON in RoomModel to the next room.
    class  HelpController
    Prints all valid commands in the game.
    class  InventoryController
    Prints the active player's inventory.
    class  LookController
    Prints the description, actors, items and exits of the current room.
    class  TakeController
    Takes the specified object if the item does not make the current player exceed their weight limit.
    class  TalkController
    Attempts to call the specified NPC's onTalk() if present.

  • Uses of CommandController in command.game.eventController

    Subclasses of CommandController in command.game.eventController 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  InitPlayersController
    Instantiates a number of Player objects and pushes them to the playerArr array.
    class  NewTurnController
    Sets the currentPlayer variable to the next Player object in the playerArr array.
    class  SingleOrMultiController
    Validates user's choice and sets single or multi-player game.

  • Uses of CommandController in command.game.eventOutput

    class  NewTurnOutput
